name: cordova-plugin-imagezoom-test-ios
description: iOS Unit Tests for Imagezoom Plugin
author: Apache Software Foundation

scripts.test: xcodebuild test -workspace CDVImageZoomTest.xcworkspace -scheme CDVImageZoomLibTests -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 5' CONFIGURATION_BUILD_DIR='/tmp' HEADER_SEARCH_PATHS='$(OBJROOT)/UninstalledProducts/$(PLATFORM_NAME)/include'
